tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I visited the Nikad Clinic to meet Dr. Mani Venugopal. I had filtered 2 doctors to consult through Practo & Dr. Mani was one of them. 
In comparison to the other doctor,  Dr. Mani
1. Values time of his patients by respecting their appointments as much as possible.
2. Was friendly enough * ** *** ***** **** *** ******** ********* * ****** *** **** **************
3. Seemed to have hands-on experience  which is very important & something i try to figure out if you have to follow up a diagnosis with a surgery. 
I was active in sports 10 years back & considering i had met a decent no. of orthos, I would definitely rate Dr. Mani as one of the better orthos around.  I will be following up with a minor surgery to improve my situation soon.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am so happy that I could find such Great doctor in terms of experience and expertise in knee related ailments (especially for aged) and more than anything his patience in dealing with elderly is impeccable. 

His clinic is with adequate space and quite clean, and adequate number of friendly staff. To me It‚Äôs not a fancy 5 star rated ambience is important but certainly 5 stars rated treatment is, and I believe Dr Mani Venugopal is proving he and his team provides that very well to his patients. 

Thank you

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr is brilliant in his analysis as well as explaining the situation. He does not leave the burden of decision making with the patients and correctly guides them to the best option of treatment. While most doctors I showed to were in decisive he doctor gave me the right non intrusive treatment for my ankle ligament tear. 

A couple of weeks later my wife too had a ligament injury in ankle and the doctor treated her as well. Many suggested surgery but Dr Mani treated well without any intrusive treatment what so ever.

tags: None
review: I would like to give feedback about Practo being available 24/7. I fixed appointment at 5 am when my son came home with severe ankle pain after night shift. Thanks a lot.

Extremely satisfied with Dr's treatment, diagnosis and concerned advice.

I thank the Doctor for his yeoman service!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My uncle was suffering from knee pain and we were looking for doctor closeby. Within a few minutes on the road, a shop owner recommended this doctor. Excellent work. In fact, meeting a patient there who had also visited kept harping on about the best treatment they had received. My uncle, on the other hand, received the best care. üíØ I will recommend Dr. Venugopal to my family and friends.

tags: Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am very disappointed. The appointment was moved twice.. from 1 pm...to 4 pm... I got a practi notification twice confirming my appointment. I traveled the distance with my pain only to find out the doctor was absent! Some other doctor saw me after waiting for 30 min... plus I was charged 700 rs ? Why? You have failed to assign the Doctor that was promised? Why then charge the same amount? How are u compensating for my time and the inconvenience caused?Terrible!!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It‚Äôs been a year since my ACL reconstruction and I can‚Äôt thank the doctor enough for the smoothness of the entire process. Explained the issue in detail, ensured I was calm about it and completed the surgery in under a weeks time. The recovery process is tiring but he ensured he always motivated me to get back to fitness.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
** ** *** **** ****** *** *** ***** ******* *********** He did the spine surgery for my Mother without any complications and she is walking around absolutely fine. The way he explains the health issue and the treatment to be followed will keep the patient mentally strong and motivated.
There is no need for a second opinion once you approach him for any treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

Some of the doctors suggested surgery, but I contacted Dr. Mani Venugopal who understood the complexity of my case as I had polio and told me he will make me recover without surgery. I am perfectly fine and Bangalore is lucky to have Dr.Mani!!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr Mani Venugopal combines experience and a willingness to listen and discuss. 
This is my second visit. 
The Doctor puts the patient at ease. 
I felt confident in my receiving medical care.After assessment of the patient,he clearly explains the issues and explains the treatment calmly and clearly. He is well supported by his dedicated staff and the radiography technician. My only suggestion is that the doctor need not go to the radiography room every time a shot is taken for viewing the X-ray results . Technology is now available to enable him view the results sitting in his room.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My wife was suffering from severe back and leg pain. Her pain was so lethal that she even unable to walk properly. Every night and in morning she used to cry in pain. First we have visited to Banaras Hindu University for same problem and doctor suggested to go for MRI. After MRI we came to know that there is severe Nerve compression at L5-S1.She has undergone 2 month of Physiotherapy and relived to some extent but not overall relief.one of my friend suggested  to Go and meet with Dr. Mani Venugopal.Prior to that we have already Visited Apollo Hospital Bannerghatta and there we met with Dr. Arun L Naik and he suggested us to go for Spine Surgery (Microdiscetomy). We were in confusion and thought to visit Dr Venugopal and we surprised to know that Venugopal statement is ditto same as that of Arun Naik.Overall he listen your problem very carefully and provide adequate and accurate suggestion.

tags: None
review: This is the fourth time I'm visiting Dr. Mani and I've always received comprehensive solution every single time. Having all facilities in same compound helps a lot as well, since there isn't much running around to do. He is a very patient doctor and explains his diagnosis quite cleanly.

tags: None
review: It would be difficult to find a better doctor for any ailment. In knowledge he is up to date; of experience he has plenty. But best of all is the kindness of his manner. He is reassuring, and never treats the patient with condescension. Some doctors have the manner of a policeman, with the patient as offender! That is inconceivable with Dr Mani Venugopal.

tags: None
review: I went for a follow up checkup for my back and sciatic pain. Doctor spends time to understand the problem, prescribe exercises and medicines accordingly. I felt reassured after consulting him before a long trip.
